com.Cardinal.BotCreator.Utils

Class ImageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.BotCreator.Utils.ImageUtils

  • public class ImageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class used to perform advanced operations on Images, and ImageIcons.
    Author:
    Cardinal System

                                         int w,
                                         int h)
        Resizes the given Image to the given proportions.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to resize.
        w - the width to resize to.
        h - the height to resize to.
        Returns:
        the resized image.
        See Also:

      • resizeImageCanvas

        public static java.awt.Image resizeImageCanvas(java.awt.Image image,
                                               java.awt.Rectangle newCanvas)
        Resizes the canvas of the given Image. Image proportions do not change.
        Parameters:
        image - the Image whose canvas to resize.
        newCanvas - the new canvas to draw.
        Returns:
        the image with the new canvas.
        See Also:
        resizeImageCanvas(ImageIcon, Rectangle), resizeImage(ImageIcon, int, int)

      • resizeImageCanvas

        Resizes the canvas of the given ImageIcon. Image proportions do not change.
        Parameters:
        image - the ImageIcon whose canvas to resize.
        newCanvas - the new canvas to draw.
        Returns:
        the image with the new canvas.

      • resizeAspectRatio

        public static java.awt.Image resizeAspectRatio(java.awt.Image image,
                                               int width,
                                               int height)
        Resizes the given image to the given size while keeping all proportions the same. The resulting image may be smaller than the passed dimensions.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to resize.
        width - the width of the new image.
        height - the height of the new image.
        Returns:
        the resized image.
        See Also:
        resizeAspectRatio(Image, Dimension), resizeImageCanvas(Image, Rectangle)

      • resizeAspectRatio

        public static java.awt.Image resizeAspectRatio(java.awt.Image image,
                                               java.awt.Dimension desiredResize)
        Resizes the given image to the given size while keeping all proportions the same. The resulting image may be smaller than the passed dimensions.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to resize.
        desiredResize - the dimensions to resize to.
        Returns:
        the resized image.
        See Also:
        resizeAspectRatio(Image, int, int), resizeImageCanvas(ImageIcon, Rectangle)
